section.description: Every missed call is lost revenue. See how Sawtic AI transforms home service challenges into competitive advantages.

problems.title: Missed Calls During Service Jobs
problems.description: You're cleaning a villa or fixing an AC unit but missing 4 other customers calling for urgent repairs. By the time you call back, they've booked competitors.
problems.impact: 60% of cleaning leads lost to competitors

problems.title: Emergency Service Panic
problems.description: Plumbing emergencies and AC breakdowns happen at 2 AM, but your phone goes to voicemail. Desperate customers find 24/7 competitors instead.
problems.impact: 80% of emergency calls happen after hours

problems.title: Service Scope Confusion
problems.description: Customers don't know if they need deep cleaning or regular maintenance. Wrong bookings lead to unhappy customers and scope disputes.

problems.title: Seasonal Booking Overload
problems.description: Garden maintenance explodes in winter months. You can't handle the volume but lose customers who can't wait for callbacks.

problems.title: Appliance Diagnostic Guesswork
problems.description: Customers say 'washing machine broken' but you arrive with wrong parts. Multiple visits waste time and annoy customers.
problems.impact: 35% of repair jobs need return visits

problems.title: Quote Delays Kill Deals
problems.description: Painting estimates take days to prepare. Customers book competitors who provide instant quotes while you're still measuring rooms.
problems.impact: 50% of paint jobs lost to faster quotes
